name.baseName: cement production;cement, portland-composite cement, 32.5RMPa;modern dry process, rotary kiln, 5000 t/d
水泥生产;水泥, 复合硅酸盐水泥, 32.5RMPa;现代干法, 回转窑, 5000 t/d

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The company currently has a modern dry process production line with a capacity of 5000t/d. The raw material mill adopts an advanced vertical four-roller mill from Germany's Loesche, with specifications of LM60.4. Advanced new technology is employed for the clinker calcination using an external decomposition kiln.
公司现有一条5000t/d规模的现代干法生产线。原料磨采用先进的德国莱歇公司的立式四辊磨，规格为LM60.4。熟料煅烧采用了先进的新型窑外分解技术。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The company currently has a modern dry production line with a capacity of 5000t/d, as shown in Figure 6.5. The raw material mill adopts the advanced vertical four-roller mill of Loesche Company of Germany, with specification of LM60.4, as shown in Figure 6.6. Clinker burning adopts advanced new kiln decomposition technology.
公司现有一条 5000t/d 规模的现代干法生产线，如图 6.5 所示。原料磨采用先进的德国莱歇公司的立式四辊磨，规格为 LM60.4，如图6.6 所示。熟料烧采用了先进的新型窑外分解技术。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set describes the Portland-composite cement (32.5RMPa) production process on a modern dry process production line with a rotary kiln capacity of 5000 tonnes per day. This cement is typically used in construction applications, where moderate strength development is adequate, such as in residential buildings, pavements, and where sulfate resistance is not a primary concern. The unique composition is suitable for general concrete construction, precast units, masonry units, and for specific works such as dam construction or oil well cementing, according to the different product types manufactured by the company.
该数据集描述了日处理量为5000吨的现代干法生产线上的复合硅酸盐水泥（32.5RMPa）生产过程。这种水泥通常用于建筑应用，如适用于中等强度发展的住宅建筑、人行道，以及不需要很高耐硫酸盐性的场合。其独特组合适用于一般混凝土建筑、预制构件、砌块以及特定工程，如大坝建设或油井固井，这取决于公司生产的不同产品类型。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: LCA method was not used for modeling.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Cement product evaluation index data is obtained through on-site surveys at cement production enterprises, and the index data comes from enterprise production process data.Due to the lack of specific industrial pollutant emission statistics, the data collection process is very difficult, and some data cannot be obtained directly, so it is obtained by converting related energy and raw materials.
水泥产品评价指标数据通过到水泥生产企业实地调研获得，指标数据来自于企业生产工艺数据。由于缺乏具体的工业污染物排放统计数据，数据收集过程十分困难，部分数据无法直接获取，因此采用相关能源与原材料折算的方式获取。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 李礼. (2012). 建筑材料绿色性的6E综合评价体系研究 [博士, 大连理工大学].
李礼. (2012). 建筑材料绿色性的6E综合评价体系研究 [博士, 大连理工大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: DCGC was founded in 1907 and is one of the key national cement enterprises. The production line has a designed production capacity of 5,500 tons of clinker per day and an annual output of more than 2 million tons of cement. The main products include "Seagull Brand" PO32.5R type, PO42.5R type ordinary Portland cement, A-grade oil well cement, G-grade medium and high sulfur-resistant oil well cement, and dam cement. "Wuyang Brand" Portland cement: "Ocean Brand" PO32.5R type, PO42.5R type ordinary Portland cement, PS32.5R type cement. DCGC has a registered capital of RMB 4.89 billion and a factory area of ​​370,000 square meters. The company currently has 434 employees. The annual output of clinker is 155 tons and the annual output of cement is 1.82 million tons.

DCGC始建于1907年，为国家重点水泥骨干企业之一，该生产线设计生产能力为日产熟料5500吨，年产水泥200多万吨。主要产品有《海鸥牌》PO32.5R型、PO42.5R型普通硅酸盐水泥、A级油井水泥G级中、高抗硫油井水泥、大坝水泥。《五羊牌》波特兰水泥：《远洋牌》PO32.5R型、PO42.5R型普通硅酸盐水泥、PS32.5R型水泥。DCGC公司注册资本人民币48.90亿元，厂区占地37万平方米。公司现有从业人员434人。年产熟料155吨，年产水泥182万吨。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) or other environmental studies, please take into consideration that the LCA method was not used for modeling, indicating that the environmental impacts may not be comprehensive. It is advised to supplement this data with additional emission statistics and product-specific information when available. The data is based on the production technology of Dalian Cement Company as of the information cutoff date and does not consider future technological changes or improvements. Ensure to account for the technological applicability of the data to your specific context and update the data as required for accuracy. Recycling and end-of-life considerations are not included in this data set, so these should be accounted for separately if relevant to the intended use.

在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）或其他环境研究时，请考虑到未采用LCA方法建模，这表明环境影响可能不全面。建议在可能的情况下，用额外的排放统计数据和产品特定信息来补充该数据。该数据基于信息截止日期时大连水泥公司的生产技术，并未考虑未来技术的变化或改进。确保将数据的技术适用性考虑到您的具体情况中，并根据需要更新数据以确保准确性。回收和产品生命周期末期的考虑在此数据集中未包含，因此如果与预期用途相关，应单独对其进行核算。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Limestone
石灰石
Clay
粘土
Iron powder
铁粉
Gupsum
石膏
Electricity
电
Coal
原煤
SO2. The main source of SO2 emissions in the production of building materials is from sulfides contained in fuels and raw materials.
SO2。建材制品生产过程中排放的SO2主要来源于燃料和原料中所含的硫化物。

NOX. The emissions of NOx in the production of building materials come from two main sources. The first is the combination of N and O2 in the air at high temperatures, which is directly related to the temperature. The second is the low-temperature combination of N and O2 in the fuel, which is related to the concentration of O2.
NOx。建材制品生产过程中排放的NOx来源主要两种途径。第一种，在高温状态下，空气中的N与O2化合而成，与温度高低有着直接关系。第二种，燃料中的N与O2低温化合而成，与O2的浓度有关系。
CO2. The main sources of CO2 emissions in the building materials industry are from fuel combustion and raw material decomposition.
CO2。建材工业CO2的产生途径主要来源于燃料燃烧和原材料分解。

Dust, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter. The production of dust in the production of building materials is related to the content of powdered materials in the raw materials.
粉尘。建材制品生产过程中粉尘的产生与原材料中粉状物含量有关。未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。

COD (chemical oxygen demand) (mg/l). Chemical oxygen demand (COD) refers to the amount of oxidant consumed when treating wastewater with a strong oxidant. It is used to measure the degree of organic pollution in wastewater. The larger the COD value, the more severe the wastewater pollution.
化学需氧量（mg/l）。化学需氧量（COD）是指采用强氧化剂处理废水时，所消耗的氧化剂的量。用它来衡量废水受有机物污染的指标，化学需氧量越大说明废水污染越严重。

SS (suspended solids) (mg/l). The suspended solids in the wastewater discharged from the building materials industry mainly refer to inorganic substances, organic substances, sediment, clay, microorganisms, and other substances that are insoluble in water.
悬浮物（SS）（mg/l）。建材工业废水排放中的悬浮物主要是指不溶于水的无机物、有机物、泥沙、粘土、微生物等。

Petroleum (mg/l). Oil pollution in wastewater mainly comes from production enterprises such as steel, coking, and petrochemicals. According to the size of the oil droplet diameter, there are three forms of oil substances in wastewater: floating oil, dispersed oil, and emulsified oil, and the difficulty of separation from wastewater increases in that order.
石油类（mg/l）。废水中的油类污染物主要米源于钢铁、焦化、石油化工等生产企业。根据油滴粒径的出大到小，油类物质在废水中有三种存在形式：上浮油、分散油、乳化油，其从废水中的分离难度也依次递增。
Solid waste refers to the solid waste generated during the production process, such as dust (with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter).
固废，文中指生产过程中产生的扬尘等固体废弃物。未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。
Cement, PC32.5R
水泥，PC32.5R
